paragraphs.text: %md # Prediction Flight Delays with Spark ML This notebook demonstrates how to use Apache Spark’s ML pipelines with a Random Forest Classifier to predict flight delays. For more information, see [this](https://mapr.com/ebook/getting-started-with-apache-spark-v2/) MapR Spark ebook.

msg.data:
Prediction Flight Delays with Spark ML

This notebook demonstrates how to use Apache Spark’s ML pipelines with a Random Forest Classifier to predict flight delays. For more information, see this MapR Spark ebook.

paragraphs.text:
%md 
## Data Exploration
For this tutorial, we'll be using data from http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&DB_Short_Name=On-Time.
The CSV data has been cleaned and tranformed into a JSON file with the following format: 
{
    "id": "ATL_BOS_2018-01-01_DL_104",
    "fldate": "2018-01-01",
    "month": 1,
    "dofW": 1,
    "carrier": "DL",
    "src": "ATL",
    "dst": "BOS",
    "crsdephour": 9,
    "crsdeptime": 850,
    "depdelay": 0.0,
    "crsarrtime": 1116,
    "arrdelay": 0.0,
    "crselapsedtime": 146.0,
    "dist": 946.0
}

We use a Scala case class and Structype to define the schema, corresponding to a line in the JSON data file.

msg.data:
Data Exploration

For this tutorial, we’ll be using data from http://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.asp?Table_ID=236&DB_Short_Name=On-Time.
The CSV data has been cleaned and tranformed into a JSON file with the following format:
{
“id”: “ATL_BOS_2018-01-01_DL_104”,
“fldate”: “2018-01-01”,
“month”: 1,
“dofW”: 1,
“carrier”: “DL”,
“src”: “ATL”,
“dst”: “BOS”,
“crsdephour”: 9,
“crsdeptime”: 850,
“depdelay”: 0.0,
“crsarrtime”: 1116,
“arrdelay”: 0.0,
“crselapsedtime”: 146.0,
“dist”: 946.0
}

We use a Scala case class and Structype to define the schema, corresponding to a line in the JSON data file.

paragraphs.title: Import needed packages
paragraphs.text:
%spark
import org.apache.spark._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType}

msg.data:
import org.apache.spark._
import org.apache.spark.sql.functions._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types.{StructType, StructField, StringType, IntegerType}

paragraphs.title: Define Schema for JSON file data
paragraphs.text:
val schema = StructType(Array(
    StructField("id", StringType, true),
    StructField("fldate", StringType, true),
    StructField("month", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("dofW", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("carrier", StringType, true),
    StructField("src", StringType, true),
    StructField("dst", StringType, true),
    StructField("orig_dest", StringType, true),
    StructField("label", StringType, true),
    StructField("prediction", StringType, true),
    StructField("crsdephour", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("crsdeptime", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("depdelay", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("crsarrtime", IntegerType, true),
    StructField("arrdelay", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("crselapsedtime", DoubleType, true),
    StructField("dist", DoubleType, true)
  ))

msg.data: schema: org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType = StructType(StructField(id,StringType,true), StructField(fldate,StringType,true), StructField(month,IntegerType,true), StructField(dofW,IntegerType,true), StructField(carrier,StringType,true), StructField(src,StringType,true), StructField(dst,StringType,true), StructField(orig_dest,StringType,true), StructField(label,StringType,true), StructField(prediction,StringType,true), StructField(crsdephour,IntegerType,true), StructField(crsdeptime,IntegerType,true), StructField(depdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crsarrtime,IntegerType,true), StructField(arrdelay,DoubleType,true), StructField(crselapsedtime,DoubleType,true), StructField(dist,DoubleType,true))

paragraphs.title: Read the data from JSON file into a Dataset of type Flight
paragraphs.text: var tableName: String = "/user/mapr/flighttable"

msg.data: tableName: String = /user/mapr/flighttable

paragraphs.title: Add origin_dest column  and display the first 20 rows
paragraphs.text:
import com.mapr.db._
import com.mapr.db.spark._
import com.mapr.db.spark.impl._
import com.mapr.db.spark.sql._

val spark: SparkSession = SparkSession.builder().appName("flightread").getOrCreate()
 
// load  dataset from MapR-DB 
val df = spark.sparkSession.loadFromMapRDB(tableName, schema)

df.take(1)

paragraphs.text: df.printSchema

paragraphs.text:
%md
The describe() function performs summary statistics calculations on  numeric columns

msg.data: The describe() function performs summary statistics calculations on numeric columns

paragraphs.title: Perform summary statistics  on selected columns
paragraphs.text: df.describe("dist", "crselapsedtime","depdelay", "arrdelay").show

%md
In the code below a Spark Bucketizer is used to split the dataset into delayed and not delayed flights with a 
delayed 0/1 column. Then the resulting total counts are displayed.

msg.data:
In the code below a Spark Bucketizer is used to split the dataset into delayed and not delayed flights with a
delayed 0/1 column. Then the resulting total counts are displayed.

paragraphs.title: Add Column for Delayed Flights and count
paragraphs.text: df.groupBy("src","dst","label","prediction").count.show

paragraphs.title: Register Dataset as a Temporary View in order to explore with SQL
paragraphs.text:
df.createOrReplaceTempView("flights")
spark.catalog.cacheTable("flights")

%md 
# Use Spark SQL to explore the dataset

msg.data: Use Spark SQL to explore the dataset

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select crsdephour, prediction, count(prediction) 
from flights group by crsdephour, prediction order by crsdephour

table.tableOptionSpecHash: [{"name":"useFilter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable filter for columns"},{"name":"showPagination","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable pagination for better navigation"},{"name":"showAggregationFooter","valueType":"boolean","defaultValue":false,"widget":"checkbox","description":"Enable a footer for displaying aggregated values"}]

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select crsdephour, label, count(label) 
from flights group by crsdephour,label order by crsdephour

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select carrier, prediction, count(prediction) from flights 
group by carrier, prediction order by carrier

paragraphs.title: Average Departure Delay by Originating Airport
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT src, avg(depdelay) as avgdelay
FROM flights 
GROUP BY src
ORDER BY avgdelay desc

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure Delays by Day of the Week (1=Monday, 7=Sunday)
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select dofW, count(label)
from flights where label=1
group by dofW

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure Delays by Carrier (where delay=40 minutes)
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select carrier, count(label)
from flights where label = 1
group by carrier
order by carrier

paragraphs.title: Count of Delayed Not Delayed  by Carrier
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT label, count(label),carrier
FROM flights
GROUP BY carrier, label
order by carrier

paragraphs.title: Count of Departure not Delayed by Hour of Day
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select crsdephour, count(label)
from flights where label=0
group by crsdephour

paragraphs.title: Count of Predicted not delayed by hour
paragraphs.text:
%sql
select crsdephour, count(prediction)
from flights where prediction=0
group by crsdephour
